Methodology : Among patient undergo CRT severe heart failure accord indication stipulate international Cardiology guideline , baseline demographic data collect . Age , gender , NYHA functional class , co-morbidities , QRS width ECG , presence leave bundle branch block pattern ECG , presence atrial fibrillation , leave ventricular ejection fraction ( LVEF ) echocardiogram , ventricular dimension , 6 min walk test distance collect . In addition , CRT implant procedure , blood drawn vascular access analyse NT-pro BNP level biomarkers heart failure . The echocardiographic ECG parameter blood biomarkers reanalysed 6 month 12 month follow CRT implant . Response CRT define reduction iLVESV ( left ventricular end-systolic volume index body surface area ) > /= 15 % and/or increase LVEF > /= 10 % .
